mapper.select: SELECT bid,material_type_id, material_quantity, ROUND(material_quantity/(SELECT SUM(material_quantity) FROM daily_material WHERE bid = #{bid} and date between #{startDate} and #{endDate})*100,1) as materialPercent from daily_material WHERE bid = #{bid} and date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY material_type_id ORDER BY material_quantity DESC
